languages.text: "Обвинения, выдвинутые губернатором Драйвстемом, были сфальсифицированы. Род Версериан не причастен к организации бунтов и заговору против Вольного Торговца. Тем не менее, истинные преступники находятся здесь..."

traits.locale_text: "Обвинения, выдвинутые губернатором Драйвстемом были сфальсифицированы. Род Версериан не причастен к организации бунтов и заговору против Вольного Торговца. Тем не менее истинные преступники находятся здесь..."

languages.text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. However, the real perpetrators are here in this very room..."
languages.original_text: "Обвинения, выдвинутые губернатором Драйвстемом, были сфальсифицированы. Род Версериан не причастен к организации бунтов и заговору против Вольного Торговца. Тем не менее, истинные преступники находятся здесь..."

traits.locale_text: "The charges pressed by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian is not involved in organising the riots and conspiring against the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the true culprits are present here right now..."

"The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. However, the real perpetrators are here in this very room..."

languages.text: 「ドライブステン総督による告発はねつ造だった。ウェルザリアン家は、組織的な暴動とも、自由開拓者を狙う陰謀とも無関係である。とは言え、真犯人たちは今この部屋にいる…」
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. However, the real perpetrators are here in this very room..."

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステン総督による告発はねつ造だった。ウェルザリアン家は、組織的な暴動とも、自由開拓者を狙う陰謀とも無関係である。とは言え、真犯人たちは今この部屋にいる…」

languages.text: “德莱夫斯塔总督的指控纯属捏造，韦尔森家族从未煽动任何暴乱或参与针对行商浪人的阴谋。不过，真正的罪魁祸首就在这个房间里……”
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. However, the real perpetrators are here in this very room..."

traits.locale_text: “德莱夫斯塔总督的指控纯属捏造，韦尔森家族从未煽动任何暴乱或参与针对行商浪人的阴谋。不过，真正的罪魁祸首就在这里……”

languages.text: « Les accusations portées par le gouverneur Drivestem étaient inventées de toutes pièces. La maison Werserian n'est en aucun cas mêlée aux révoltes et au complot visant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Les véritables coupables, en revanche, sont ici, parmi vous... »
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. However, the real perpetrators are here in this very room..."

traits.locale_text: « Les accusations portées par le gouverneur Drivestem étaient fabriquées de toutes pièces. La maison Werserian n'est en aucun cas mêlée aux révoltes et au complot visant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Les véritables coupables, en revanche, sont ici, parmi vous... »

languages.text: «Los cargos que presenta el gobernador Drivestem son falsos. La casa Werserian no tiene nada que ver con los disturbios ni con el complot contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, los verdaderos autores se encuentran en esta misma sala...».
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. However, the real perpetrators are here in this very room..."

traits.locale_text: «Los cargos de los que habla el gobernador Drivestem son falsos. La casa Werserian no tiene nada que ver con los disturbios ni con el complot contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, los verdaderos autores se encuentran aquí hoy...».

languages.text: "Die von Gouverneur Drivestem vorgebrachten Anschuldigungen waren fingiert. Haus Werserian hat nichts mit der Anzettelung der Aufstände und mit der Intrige gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu tun. Doch die wahren Täter sind hier unter uns, in diesem Raum ..."
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. However, the real perpetrators are here in this very room..."

traits.locale_text: "Die von Gouverneur Drivestem vorgebrachten Anschuldigungen waren fingiert. Haus Werserian hat nichts mit der Anzettelung der Aufstände und mit der Intrige gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu tun. Doch die wahren Täter sind hier unter uns ..."

languages.text: "Vali Drivestem'in ortaya attığı ithamlar sahte çıkmıştır. Werserian Hanesi mensuplarının Hür Tacir'e karşı entrika düzenlediğine yahut isyan çıkardığına dair bir kanıt bulunamamıştır. Asıl sorumlular ise aramızdadır..."
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. However, the real perpetrators are here in this very room..."

traits.locale_text: "Vali Drivestem'in ortaya attığı ithamlar sahte çıkmıştır. Werserian Hanesi mensuplarının Hür Tacir'e karşı entrika düzenlediğine yahut isyan çıkardığına dair bir kanıt bulunamamıştır. Ancak asıl sorumlular aramızdadır..."
